game.name: Audio
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default of auto, 3.5mm jack, or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ascii file manager for linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Run Command Configuration
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Media Removal Utility
game.desc:
This utility will remove any media files (boxart, cartart, snap, wheel) that exists that does not hvae a matching rom file.
This utility will only work if you are using the following folder structure.
boxart - boxart images cartart - cartart image snap - video snaps wheel - marquee or wheel images
You can select individual systems to remove excess media files.

game.name: Launching Screens
game.desc:
This script will enable or disable the use of launching screens.
Launching screensets are located here: /home/pi/RetroPie/LaunchingScreens
Each set of launching screens you have located there must be in their own parent folder, with the individual emulator system folders containing the launching.png files underneath.

game.name: Steam Moonlight config
game.desc: Configure steam Moonlight

game.name: Raspi-Config
game.desc: Change user password, boot options, internationalization, camera, add your pi to Rastrack, overclock, overscan, memory split, SSH and more.

game.name: Overclock MasOS
game.desc: Overclock settings for RPI3 and RPI3B+.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Most themes can be previewed at https://github.com/Moriggy/

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: Retroarch Bezels
game.desc:
This script will enable or disable the use of bezel overlays for Retroarch based emulators.
Bezel overlays and config files are here: /opt/masos/configs/all/retroarch/overlay
Retroarch config files are here: /opt/masos/configs/(emulator)/retroarch.cfg
This script will update the retroarch config files to use the designated named bezel config file.

game.name: MasOS VideoLoadingscreen
game.desc: Enable or Disable video loading screen.

game.name: Bezel Project
game.desc: Download and manage games bezels.

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a wifi network and configure wifi settings.

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on MasOS boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: MasOS Info
game.desc:
Aqui puede ver informacion sobre el sistema importante para usted,como por ejemplo....
La IP actual de su dispositivo, temperaturas de CPU - GPU ,ademas puede ver informacion sobre sus discos de almacenamiento.

game.name: MasOS EXTRAs menu ES
game.desc:
Muchas opciones mas para este menu con solo un clic.
Utilidades ,herramientas ,descargas de arts y mucho mas.
Tambien puede actualizar el MasOS-Script sin introducir nada de codigos.
Con la actualizacion termine su aparato se reiniciara automaticamente...

game.name: MasOS Setup
game.desc: Install MasOS from binary or source, install experimental packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares, custom scraper, as well as other MasOS-related configurations.
